    • updateById

      public boolean updateById​(java.util.UUID id, Student updatedAttributes)
      Find a student and update them, with new qualities. For example: change their name. The implementation and type of parameters are subject to change.
      Parameters:
      id - UUID to identify a specific student
      updatedAttributes - This is a student object to compare and change the attributes that are different
      Returns:
      boolean - if attributes were changed
